info.title: PlayFab Leaderboards API
info.description: Manage entity statistics Manage entity statistics

post.description: Get the leaderboard for a specific entity type and statistic.
Get the leaderboard around a specific entity.
Get the leaderboard limited to a set of entities.
Create a new entity statistic definition.
Delete an entity statistic definition. Will delete all statistics on entity profiles and leaderboards.
Delete statistics on an entity profile, will remove all rankings from associated leaderboards.
Get all current statistic definitions information
Increment an entity statistic definition version.
Update an existing entity statistic definition.
Update statistics on an entity profile, depending on the statistic definition may cause entity to be ranked on various leaderboards.

ApiErrorWrapper.description: The basic wrapper around every failed API response

errorDetails.description: Detailed description of individual issues with the request object

AggregationMethod.description: Aggregation method for this statistic. Default is Last.

LeaderboardDefinition.description: Additional configuration options for statistics to be used for leaderboards.

Name.description: Name of the statistic. Must be less than 50 characters. Restricted to a-Z, 0-9, '(', ')', '_', '-' and '.'.
Name of the statistic to delete.

Entity.description: The entity to perform this action on.

ExpectedProfileVersion.description: Optional field used for concurrency control. By specifying the previously returned value of ProfileVersion from GetProfile API, you can ensure that the object set will only be performed if the profile has not been updated by any other clients since the version you last loaded.

Statistics.description: Collection of statistics to remove from this entity.

ProfileVersion.description: The current version of the profile, can be used for concurrency control during updates.

EntityKey.description: Combined entity type and ID structure which uniquely identifies a single entity.

EntityLeaderboardEntry.description: Individual rank of an entity in a leaderboard

EntityLeaderboardMetadata.description: Custom entity metadata as set during the last UpdateStatistic API call.

Metadata.description: Statistic or statistic child metadata as set during the UpdateStatistic API call.

CharacterId.description: The Character Id of the associated entity.

GroupId.description: The Group Id of the associated entity.

MasterPlayerAccountId.description: The Master Player Account Id of the associated entity.

NamespaceId.description: The Namespace Id of the associated entity.

TitleId.description: The Title Id of the associated entity.

TitlePlayerAccountId.description: The Title Player Account Id of the associated entity.

ChildName.description: Child name value, if child statistic
Optional child statistic name to filter the leaderboard to.

EntityType.description: Type of entity to get a leaderboard for.

MaxResults.description: maximum number of results to return from the leaderboard. Minimum 1, maximum 1,000.

StartingPosition.description: Index position to start from. 0 is beginning of leaderboard.

StatisticVersion.description: Optional version of the leaderboard statistic, defaults to current version.

Rankings.description: Individual entity rankings in the leaderboard, in sorted order by rank.

StatisticVersion.description: Version of the leaderboard being returned.

GetLeaderboardAroundEntityRequest.description: Request to load a section of a leaderboard centered on a specific entity.

ChildName.description: Optional statistic child to filter the leaderboard by.

Entity.description: The entity to perform this action on.

Offset.description: Number of ranks above and below the entity to return. If 5 then at most 11 results will be returned, 5 above, the entity, then 5 below. If the entity is at the top then only 6 will be returned, the entity and 5 below.

StatisticVersion.description: Optional version of the statistic, defaults to current.

GetLeaderboardForEntitiesRequest.description: Request a leaderboard limited to a collection of entities.

ChildName.description: Optional statistic child name to filter the leaderboard by.

Entities.description: Collection of Entity IDs to include in the leaderboard.

EntityType.description: Entity type of all Entity IDs.

StatisticVersion.description: Optional version of the statistic, defaults to current.

Name.description: Name of the statistic. Must be less than 50 characters.

LastResetTime.description: Last time, in UTC, statistic version was incremented.

StatisticDefinitions.description: List of statistic definitions for the title.

Name.description: Name of the statistic to increment the version of.

VersionToBeDeleted.description: Statistic versions and leaderboards to be removed.

ChildLeaderboardNames.description: For non-dynamic child leaderboards the statistic child name must be defined to prevent leaderboard length restrictions.

DynamicChildLeaderboardMaxSize.description: Number of entities to rank in a leaderboard when the child is dynamically defined, new entities will not be ranked unless they beat an existing score on a leaderboard. Default 0, Maximum 100.

ProvisionLeaderboard.description: Flag to indicate that leaderboards should be created/updated when this statistic is updated on an entity. Default is false.

SortDirection.description: Sort direction of the leaderboard, cannot be changed after creation. Default is Descending

LastResetTime.description: Last time, in UTC, statistic version was incremented.

ChildName.description: Optionally delete only the child statistic from this entity.

Name.description: Name of the statistic, as originally configured.

Version.description: Optional field to indicate the version of the statistic to set. When empty defaults to the statistic's current version.

ChildName.description: Arbitrary statistic child name, using child statistics will cause entity to be ranked on only the child leaderboard. See documentation for full details. Must be less than 50 UTF8 encoded characters.

Metadata.description: Arbitrary metadata to store along side the statistic or child statistic, will be returned by all Leaderboard APIs. Must be less than 50 UTF8 encoded characters.

Name.description: Name of the statistic, as originally configured.

Value.description: Statistic value for the entity. This will be used in accordance with the aggregation method configured for the statistics.

Version.description: Optional field to indicate the version of the statistic to set. When empty defaults to the statistic's current version.

ChildLeaderboardNames.description: For non-dynamic child leaderboards the statistic child name must be defined to prevent leaderboard length restrictions. Cannot remove existing child leaderboard names.

DynamicChildLeaderboardMaxSize.description: Number of entities to rank in a leaderboard when the child is dynamically defined, new entities will not be ranked unless they beat an existing score on a leaderboard. Default 0, Maximum 100.

ProvisionLeaderboard.description: Flag to indicate that leaderboards should be created/updated when this statistic is updated on an entity. Default is false.

AggregationMethod.description: Aggregation method for this statistic. Default is Last.

LeaderboardDefinition.description: Additional configuration options for statistics to be used for leaderboards.

Name.description: Current name of the statistic. Must be less than 50 characters. Restricted to a-Z, 0-9, '(', ')', '_', '-' and '.'.

NewName.description: New name of the statistic. Must be less than 50 characters. Restricted to a-Z, 0-9, '(', ')', '_', '-' and '.'.

Entity.description: The entity to perform this action on.

EntityLeaderboardMetadata.description: Arbitrary metadata to store on the entity that will be returned on all leaderboard APIs. Max length 50 characters.

ExpectedProfileVersion.description: Optional field used for concurrency control. By specifying the previously returned value of ProfileVersion from GetProfile API, you can ensure that the statistic updates will only be performed if the profile has not been updated by any other clients since the version you last loaded.

ForceUpdate.description: Flag to force the values in the request to bypass the aggregation method and be the new value for the statistic. When empty defaults to false.

Statistics.description: Collection of statistics to update, maximum 50.

ProfileVersion.description: The current version of the profile, can be used for concurrency control during updates.

GetLeaderboardAroundEntityRequest.name: GetLeaderboardAroundEntityRequest
GetLeaderboardAroundEntityRequest.description: Request to load a section of a leaderboard centered on a specific entity.

GetLeaderboardForEntitiesRequest.name: GetLeaderboardForEntitiesRequest
GetLeaderboardForEntitiesRequest.description: Request a leaderboard limited to a collection of entities.

ApiErrorWrapper.description: This is the outer-wrapper for all responses with errors

code.description: The Http status code. If X-ReportErrorAsSuccess header is set to true, this will report the actual http error code.

status.description: The Http status code as a string.

status.description: The Http status code as a string.

code.description: The Http status code. If X-ReportErrorAsSuccess header is set to true, this will report the actual http error code.

status.description: The Http status code as a string.

code.description: The Http status code. If X-ReportErrorAsSuccess header is set to true, this will report the actual http error code.

status.description: The Http status code as a string.

code.description: The Http status code. If X-ReportErrorAsSuccess header is set to true, this will report the actual http error code.

status.description: The Http status code as a string.

None.name: None
None.description: This API requires no authentication headers (usually provides one to other calls).

SessionTicket.name: SessionTicket
SessionTicket.description: This API requires a client session ticket, available from any Client Login function.

SecretKey.name: SecretKey
SecretKey.description: This API requires a title secret key, available to title admins, from PlayFab Game Manager.

EntityToken.name: EntityToken
EntityToken.description: This API requires an Entity Session Token, available from the Entity GetEntityToken method.
